channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lyft will credit NYC riders for congestion fee throughout January
item.description: New York City’s congestion pricing is scheduled to take effect Sunday — but for the first month, Lyft said it will be crediting riders who pay the fee...

item.title: What will this year bring in VC? We asked a few investors
item.description: A new year brings with it hope for a better tomorrow — kind of, at least. In the world of venture capital, nothing is quite predictable. The number of...

item.title: Elon Musk Calls Out NASA’s Moon Ambitions: ‘We’re Going Straight to Mars’
item.description: NASA has plans to return humans to the moon with the Artemis mission—but Elon Musk’s preference for Mars could have influence in the Trump administrat...

item.title: From forced landings to stuffed animal heads, headhunter Peterson Conway is defense tech’s wildest power broker
item.description: Conway has recruited for some of the buzziest defense and hard tech firms in Silicon Valley over the last decade, like Palantir and Mach Industries. ©...

item.title: Best Portable Chargers (2025): iPhones, iPads, Laptops & More
item.description: Keep your phone, tablet, laptop, and other electronics running with these handheld power banks.

item.title: Tenable CEO Amit Yoran dies
item.description: Longtime entrepreneur and cybersecurity executive Amit Yoran passed away Friday after a battle with cancer. Cybersecurity company Tenable, where Yoran...

item.title: It’s Time for Parents to Step Up in the Fight for Clean Air
item.description: Fossil fuel pollution is impacting the most vulnerable among us: children. Their future—and health—are at stake.

item.title: New ship, new year: SpaceX to deploy model Starlink satellites on next Starship launch
item.description: SpaceX is significantly upping the ante of its Starship test flight program, with the next rocket launch expected to demonstrate payload deployment fo...

item.title: Gardencup Review: Making Eating as Convenient as It Gets
item.description: Eating well doesn’t have to be difficult. Just reach into your fridge and grab a cup.

item.title: Take Part in Veganuary and You Might See Yourself Differently
